class.name: PLATEAURnRoadBase
class.brief_description: Base class for road and intersection.
class.description: PLATEAURnRoadBase is the abstract base class for [PLATEAURnRoad] and [PLATEAURnIntersection].

method.name: is_road
method.description: Check if this is a road.

method.name: is_intersection
method.description: Check if this is an intersection.
